pageContext.title: 280 handpicked startups exhibiting at TIA Jakarta 2018 (INFOGRAPHIC)
pageContext.content:
Tech in Asia Jakarta 2018 happening next week on October 23 & 24 will play host to over 5,000 passionate entrepreneurs, keen investors, media, and the wider tech community.

At the heart of our conference floor lies Startup Factory, where 280 up-and-coming startups from 16 countries will be showcasing their latest products, platforms and services. This year, we’ve got startups spanning across more than 39 verticals, with the most popular ones being fintech, SaaS and ecommerce.

Read on below for some key statistics of the exhibitors at Startup Factory:

(Click to view enlarged image)

 

Doors to TIA Jakarta 2018 open in 5 days – secured your pass yet?

Beyond the promising exhibitors at Startup Factory, leaders who are making waves in the tech space will be sharing insights into Southeast Asia’s largest economy, their experiences, and best practices you can emulate.

Fret not if you’re unable to attend all the sessions, we’ve got you covered with the post-event videos which will allow you to catch up on the nuggets of wisdom shared. There will also be tons of opportunities for you to connect with great startups, corporations, leading investors, and tech enthusiasts from all over the world through Speed Dating, networking parties, and more.

T-5 days before all the action happens – don’t miss out!

seo.title: Tech in Asia Jakarta 2018’s Startup Factory by the numbers
seo.description: 280 startups. 39 verticals. 16 countries. Will we see you at Jakarta on October 23 & 24?
